(maxBrCount, power_logic).explanation: Increasing maxBrCount requires more complex branch prediction logic circuits, directly increasing the power consumption of logic components;

(maxBrCount, power_leakage).explanation: Higher maxBrCount necessitates more transistors in branch prediction hardware, leading to increased static leakage power consumption;

(maxBrCount, area_cell_area).explanation: Larger maxBrCount requires more hardware resources for branch prediction tables and logic, directly increasing the physical area occupied by cells;
